description: An over-the-counter melatonin supplement, commonly prescribed to treat sleep deprivation and to mitigate its effects.  One tablet a day combined with a good night's sleep will help you recover faster.
Medical-grade amphetamine salts mixed with dextroamphetamine salts, commonly prescribed to treat hyperactive attention deficits.  It suppresses the appetite, and is quite addictive.

variants.description: Medical-grade amphetamine salts mixed with dextroamphetamine salts, commonly prescribed to treat hyperactive attention deficits.  It suppresses the appetite, and is quite addictive.

description: A syringe filled with a shot of epinephrine, also called adrenalin.  It serves as a powerful stimulant when you inject yourself with it.  Asthmatics can use it in an emergency to clear an asthma attack.

use_action.activation_message: You inject yourself with the injector.

description: Antibacterial medication designed to prevent or stop the spread of infection.  It's the safest way to cure any infections you might have.  One dose lasts twelve hours.
A powerful chemical tablet designed to eliminate fungal infections in living creatures.  One dose lasts four hours.
A broad-spectrum chemical tablet designed to eliminate parasitic infestations in living creatures.  Though designed for use on pets and livestock, it will likely work on humans as well.
Acetylsalicylic acid, a mild anti-inflammatory and blood thinner.  Take to relieve pain and swelling.  Careful - it can increase bleeding.
Ibuprofen, a mild NSAID-based painkiller.  Take to relieve pain and swelling.
Naproxen, a mild long-lasting NSAID-based painkiller.  Take to relieve pain and swelling.
Acetaminophen, a mild painkiller that works well in conjunction with NSAID-based painkillers like aspirin.  Take to relieve pain and swelling.
Metaprolol, a classic beta blocker.  It lowers blood pressure and decouples heart rate from stressful events such as anxiety or pain.
A powdered form of chemical antiseptic, this bismuth formic iodide cleans wounds quickly and painlessly.
Sugar-free chewing gum with added caffeine.  It's a nice pick-me-up, one stick is equivalent to a strong cup of tea.
A No-doz brand caffeine pill, maximum strength.  Useful in pulling an all-nighter, one pill is equivalent to a strong cup of coffee.
Mint-flavored chewing tobacco.  While absolutely terrible for your health, it was once a favorite amongst baseball players, cowboys, and other macho types.
Dilute hydrogen peroxide, for use as an antiseptic and for bleaching hair or textiles.  Foams a little when in contact with organic matter, but otherwise harmless.

A mixture of dried tobacco leaf, pesticides, and chemical additives, rolled into a filtered paper tube.  Stimulates mental acuity and reduces appetite.  Highly addictive and hazardous to health, but lung cancer is kind of the least of your concerns at this point.

Rolled, cured tobacco leaf, addictive and hazardous to health.
A gentleman's vice, cigars set the civil man apart from the savage.
A debug item that lets you put NPCs (or yourself) to sleep.
A mild opiate used in the suppression of pain, cough, and other ailments.  While relatively weak for a narcotic, it is still addictive, with a potential for overdose.
Crystalline extract of the coca leaf, or at least, a white powder with some of that in it.  A topical analgesic, it is more commonly used for its stimulatory properties.  Highly addictive.
A potent cocktail of amphetamines, caffeine and corn syrup, this stuff puts a spring in your step, a fire in your eye, and a bad case of tachycardia tremors in your somersaulting heart.

Small plastic case with two extended-wear soft contact lenses, buffered in saline solution.  They are a great replacement for wearing glasses and sit comfortably on the surface of the eye.  The lenses are designed to help anyone with <color_light_blue>nearsightedness</color>, and should be discarded after <color_light_blue>a week</color> of use.

use_action.description: You can use this to mitigate your nearsightedness.

description: Small plastic case with two extended-wear soft contact lenses, buffered in saline solution.  This high-tech pair darkens in response to light, making it easier to see in bright environments.  They sit comfortably on the surface of the eye.  The lenses are designed to help anyone with <color_light_blue>nearsightedness</color>, and should be discarded after <color_light_blue>a week</color> of use.

use_action.description: You can use this to mitigate your nearsightedness.

description: Small plastic case with two daily-use soft contact lenses, buffered in saline solution.  They are a great replacement for wearing glasses and sit comfortably on the surface of the eye.  They sit comfortably on the surface of the eye.  The lenses are designed to help anyone with <color_light_blue>nearsightedness</color>, and should be discarded after <color_light_blue>16 hours</color> of use.

use_action.description: You can use this to mitigate your nearsightedness.

description: Small plastic case with two transition daily-use soft contact lenses, buffered in saline solution.  This high-tech pair darkens in response to light, making it easier to see in bright environments.  They are a great replacement for wearing glasses and sit comfortably on the surface of the eye.  The lenses are designed to help anyone with <color_light_blue>nearsightedness</color>, and should be discarded after <color_light_blue>16 hours</color> of use.

use_action.description: You can use this to mitigate your nearsightedness.

description: Small plastic case with two extended-wear soft contact lenses, buffered in saline solution.  They are a great replacement for wearing glasses and sit comfortably on the surface of the eye.  The lenses are designed to help anyone with <color_light_blue>farsightedness</color>, and should be discarded after <color_light_blue>a week</color> of use.

use_action.description: You can use this to mitigate your farsightedness.

description: Small plastic case with two transition extended-wear soft contact lenses, buffered in saline solution.  This high-tech pair darkens in response to light, making it easier to see in bright environments.  The lenses are designed to help anyone with <color_light_blue>farsightedness</color>, and should be discarded after <color_light_blue>a week</color> of use.

use_action.description: You can use this to mitigate your farsightedness.

description: Small plastic case with two extended-wear soft contact lenses, buffered in saline solution.  They are a great replacement for wearing glasses and sit comfortably on the surface of the eye.  The lenses are designed to help anyone with <color_light_blue>farsightedness</color>, and should be discarded after <color_light_blue>16 hours</color> of use.

use_action.description: You can use this to mitigate your farsightedness.

This high-tech pair darkens in response to light, making it easier to see in bright environments.  The lenses are designed to help anyone with <color_light_blue>farsightedness</color>, and should be discarded after <color_light_blue>a week</color> of use.

use_action.description: You can use this to mitigate your farsightedness.

description: Small plastic case with two extended-wear soft contact lenses, buffered in saline solution.  They are a great replacement for wearing glasses and sit comfortably on the surface of the eye.  They sit comfortably on the surface of the eye.  The lenses are designed to help anyone with <color_light_blue>both nearsightedness and farsightedness</color>, and should be discarded after <color_light_blue>a week</color> of use.

use_action.description: You can use this to mitigate your nearsightedness or farsightedness.

description: Small plastic case with two transition extended-wear soft contact lenses, buffered in saline solution.  This high-tech pair darkens in response to light, making it easier to see in bright environments.  They are a great replacement for wearing glasses and sit comfortably on the surface of the eye.  The lenses are designed to help anyone with <color_light_blue>both nearsightedness and farsightedness</color>, and should be discarded after <color_light_blue>a week</color> of use.

use_action.description: You can use this to mitigate your nearsightedness or farsightedness.

The lenses are designed to help anyone with <color_light_blue>both nearsightedness and farsightedness</color>, and should be discarded after <color_light_blue>16 hours</color> of use.

use_action.description: You can use this to mitigate your nearsightedness or farsightedness.

This high-tech pair darkens in response to light, making it easier to see in bright environments.  The lenses are designed to help anyone with <color_light_blue>both nearsightedness and farsightedness</color>, and should be discarded after <color_light_blue>16 hours</color> of use.

use_action.description: You can use this to mitigate your nearsightedness or farsightedness.

description: Small plastic case with two transition extended-wear soft contact lenses, buffered in saline solution.  This high-tech pair darkens in response to light, making it easier to see in bright environments, but it doesn't help with any sight issues.  Essentially a pair of temporary sunglasses, this lenses should be discarded after <color_light_blue>a week</color> of use.

use_action.description: You can use this to mitigate your the bright light discomfort.

description: Small plastic case with two transition daily-use soft contact lenses, buffered in saline solution.  This high-tech pair darkens in response to light, making it easier to see in bright environments, but it doesn't help with any sight issues.  Essentially a pair of temporary sunglasses, this lenses should be discarded after <color_light_blue>16 hours</color> of use.

use_action.description: You can use this to mitigate the bright light discomfort.

description: Deprotonated cocaine crystals, incredibly addictive and deleterious to brain chemistry.

use_action.activation_message: You smoke your crack rocks.  Mother would be proud.

description: Daytime cold and flu medication, non-drowsy formula.  Will suppress coughing, aching, headaches and runny noses, but you'll still need lots of fluids and rest.
A powerful antiseptic commonly used to disinfect wounds.
Makeshift antiseptic made from ethanol.  Can be used to disinfect wounds.
A strong benzodiazepine drug used to treat muscle spasms, anxiety, seizures, and panic attacks.

variants.description: A strong benzodiazepine drug used to treat muscle spasms, anxiety, seizures, and panic attacks.

description: Concentrated cannabis extract, commonly known as dabs.  This particular style of concentrate is in a thin sheet and shatters like glass at room temperature.  Arguably one of the better styles of concentrate compared to wax, crumble, or distillate.  Normal cannabis contains around 20% THC; this shatter should be around 55% THC.

use_action.activation_message: You take a dab.  Wow, that's got some killer terpenes!

effects.//: If at some point we add neuropathic painkillers, this should be changed to one.

description: Concentrated cannabis extract, commonly known as dabs.  This particular style of concentrate is yellow and waxy at room temperature.  Normal cannabis contains around 20% THC; this wax should be around 45% THC.

use_action.activation_message: You take a dab of wax.  *cough cough* Good stuff!

description: Concentrated cannabis extract.  This style of extract goes through the most processing, eliminating most if not all harmful ingredients.  Normal cannabis contains around 20% THC; this distillate should be around 88% THC.  Can be smoked using a refillable electronic cigarette.

use_action.activation_message: You take a dab of distillate.  Sooooo smooth…

description: This battery-operated device vaporizes a liquid that contains flavorings and nicotine.  A less harmful alternative to traditional cigarettes, but it's still addictive.  It can't be reused once it's empty.
Sterile saline eye drops.  Can be used to treat dry eyes, or to wash out contaminants.
A pharmaceutical flu shot designed for mass vaccinations, still in its packaging.  Purported to provide immunity to influenza, for the flu season for which it was developed.
A roll-your-own cigarette.  Stimulates mental acuity and reduces appetite.  Despite being hand crafted, it's still highly addictive and hazardous to health.
//: Tougher to market a hand rolled, could be anything in there.

description: An extremely strong opioid narcotic derived from morphine.  Incredibly addictive, the risk of overdose is extreme, and the drug is contraindicated for nearly all medical purposes.
A potassium iodide tablet.  If taken prior to exposure, they help to mitigate injury caused by radiation absorption.
Marijuana, cannabis, pot.  Whatever you want to call it, it's rolled up in a piece of paper and ready for smokin'.
A tiny pink tabs resembling a postage stamp, dosed with some sort of drug.  Really only useful for entertainment.  Will cause hallucinations.
A profoundly addictive and powerful stimulant.  While extremely effective at enhancing alertness, it is hazardous to health and the risk of an adverse reaction is great.

A profoundly addictive and powerful stimulant.  While extremely effective at enhancing alertness, it is hazardous to health and the risk of an adverse reaction is great.  This one could have only been made by a great chemist.
A very strong, naturally-occurring narcotic used to treat intense pain in hospital settings.  You'll need a syringe to inject it, and it's very addictive, so be careful.
An ointment infused with wintergreen oil.  Has mild antiseptic properties, and can ease the pain caused by wounds.
Some essential oil made from mugwort, which may kill parasites when ingested.  Consume it with water!
Mint flavored sugar-free nicotine chewing gum.  For smokers who desire to quit.
Nighttime cold and flu medication.  Useful when trying to sleep with a head full of virions.  Will cause drowsiness.
Over-the-counter allergy medication.  These are meant to be taken once a day and can cause drowsiness.
//: Flu meds contain antihistamines among other things, so it's intended that there's some overlap between this and cough syrup.

description: A strong semi-synthetic narcotic used in the treatment of intense pain.  Highly addictive.
//: Fairly controlled substance as they go.

description: A habit-forming tranquilizer with a variety of psychoactive side effects.  Used in the treatment of insomnia.

variants.description: Its generic name is zolpidem tartarate.

use_action.description: Can be used to treat insomnia.

description: A potent opioid palliative produced by the refining of the mutated poppy.  Notably devoid of euphoric or sedative effects, but as an opiate it can still be addictive.
A potent sleep aid extracted from mutated poppy seeds.  Effective, but as an opiate it can be addictive.

use_action.description: Can be used to treat insomnia.

description: Cough syrup made from mutated poppy.  Will make you sleepy.

An experimental, cutting-edge antivenom in the form of a small amber vial, designed to be injected a few hours before venom exposure.  It was developed in top secret by the military in response to increasing biological/chemical warfare.

use_action.activation_message: You inject a vial of prophylactic antivenom into your arm.  You feel a bit queasy.

description: A common and popular antidepressant.  It will elevate mood, and can profoundly alter the effects of other drugs.  It is only rarely habit-forming, though adverse reactions are not uncommon.
//: Don't have a cite for this one.

description: A tablet containing oxidized ferrous ferrocyanide salts.  Capable of purging nuclear contaminants from the body if taken after radiation exposure.
A powdered antihemorrhagic compound that reacts with blood to immediately form a gel-like substance that stops bleeding.
A solution of sterilized water and salt for intravenous infusion or washing contaminants from one's eyes.
Anti-psychotic medication.  Used to stabilize brain chemistry, it can arrest hallucinations and other symptoms of psychosis.  Carries a sedative effect.
Some essential oil made from thyme, which can act as a mildly irritating antiseptic.

Loose, fine-cut tobacco leaves.  Popular in Europe and among hipsters.  Highly addictive and hazardous to health.
Can either be rolled into a cigarette with some rolling papers or smoked through a pipe.
A painkiller used to manage moderate pain.  The effects last for several hours, but are relatively subdued for an opioid.
Essential dietary nutrients conveniently packaged in pill form.  An option of last resort when a balanced diet is not possible.  Excess use can cause hypervitaminosis.
A white calcium tablet.  Widely used by elderly people with osteoporosis as a method to supplement calcium before the apocalypse.
A homemade calcium supplement made out of bone meal.  Tastes horrible and is hard to swallow but it does its job.
A homemade calcium supplement made out of bone meal.  Due to some sweeteners mixed in to counteract the powdery texture and the taste of ash, it's almost as palatable as the pre-Cataclysm tablets.
Essential dietary nutrients conveniently packaged in a fruit-flavored chewy candy form.  An option of last resort when a balanced diet is not possible.  Excess use can cause hypervitaminosis.
A homeopathic pill, prepared through the repeated dilution of an active ingredient with water.  The label purports that these pills are able to maintain general wellness.

use_action.activation_message: You swallow the %s.  You wait in anticipation of its effects.

snippet_category.text: An Oscillococcinum homeopathic pill, prepared through the dilution of one part duck offal with 10^400 parts water.  The label purports that these pills are able to treat flu-like symptoms and maintain general wellness.

An Arsenicum album homeopathic pill, prepared through the dilution of one part arsenic trioxide with 10^24 parts water.  Purported to treat anxiety, various digestive disorders, and arsenic poisoning.

An Allium cepa homeopathic pill, prepared through the dilution of one part onion with 10^30 parts water.  The label states that these pills can ameliorate symptoms of asthma, gastrointestinal disorders, and bronchitis.  You briefly wonder if it can cure fungal infections.
An Arum tryphillum homeopathic pill, prepared through the dilution of the jack-in-the-pulpit plant with 10^30 parts water.  The label claims that the pills are able to treat voice loss.
An Aesculus hippocastanum homeopathic pill, prepared through the dilution of horse chestnut with 10^30 parts water.  These pills are meant to treat dysentery and hemorrhoids.
A Lachesis mutus pill, prepared through the dilution of the venom of the bushmaster snake with 10^1000 parts water.  These pills are claimed to be an effective treatment for sore throat.

description: A small vial of dark yellow liquid containing soluble iron for injection.

The dried flower buds and leaves harvested from a psychoactive variety of hemp plant.  Used to reduce nausea, stimulate appetite and elevate mood.  It can be habit-forming, and adverse reactions are possible.

use_action.activation_message: You smoke some weed.  Good stuff, man!

description: An anti-anxiety agent with a powerful sedative effect.  May cause dissociation and loss of memory.  It is dangerously addictive, and withdrawal from regular use should be gradual.
//: Yeah, kinda guessing at these ones, but generic is cheaper.

variants.description: An anti-anxiety agent with a powerful sedative effect.  May cause dissociation and loss of memory.  It is dangerously addictive, and withdrawal from regular use should be gradual.

description: A narrow-spectrum antibiotic used to suppress infections and prevent them from spreading.  It isn't broad enough to purge most infections outright, but it boosts the body's resistance against them.  One dose lasts twelve hours.
Creamy pink heartburn syrup that soothes upset stomachs and quells vomitous urges.
A common stomach soother in flavored tablet form.  Makes you less likely to vomit.

An apple-red gel capsule the size of your thumbnail, filled with a thick, oily liquid that shifts from black to purple at unpredictable intervals, flecked with tiny gray dots.  Given the place you got it from, it's either very potent, or highly experimental.  Holding it, all the little aches and pains seem to fade, just for a moment…
Clear jelly harvested from cattails.  Can be used to protect a wound from contamination, and works as a painkiller.

A broad-spectrum antibacterial medication designed to prevent or stop the spread of infection.  It contains nearly toxic levels of antibiotics, but can treat any bacterial infections you may encounter.  One dose lasts twelve hours.
A medical cream that provides both vascular restriction and anesthetic properties.
